snippet: The surveys confirm that Rick Santorum has gained a bit of ground lately, while Newt Gingrich has slipped.
abstract: The surveys confirm that Rick Santorum has gained a bit of ground lately, while Newt Gingrich has slipped.
lead_paragraph: Echoing Friday morning's Suffolk University tracking poll, two new statewide polls in New Hampshire show Mitt Romney firmly in place as the front-runner, with Rick Santorum and Ron Paul gaining support in the wake of their strong finishes in the Iowa caucuses.

headline.main: More Polls Cement Romney's Lead in New Hampshire
